name: Unibot Ball Prototype v0.15
description:
Notice

This WebGL build has some known issues listed below:

  • Sound compression makes every sound effects cut off
  • Mouse acceleration issues causes the camera to have an unstable sensitivity in the game
  • Some visual effects are not being rendered correctly, including text and particles
  • Custom cursor is not working
  • Performance stuttering can occur

Download exe build here to avoid those issues: 
https://drive.google.com/uc?id=19mgLUVojZUzTUUN4PxpHwPO60-JE_F0t&export=download
